sentences.sContent: a patient suffering from paranoid schizophrenia
sentences.sCn: 一个偏执型精神分裂症病人
…这些可悲的、被蒙蔽的妄想狂们。

trans.tranCn: 类似妄想狂的；属于偏执狂的
trans.tranOther: suffering from a mental illness that makes you believe that other people are trying to harm you

trans.tranCn: 患妄想狂的人；偏执狂患者
trans.tranOther: A paranoid is someone who is paranoid
